title: Bug 17758 - Problems with 'Go Into' action in Navigator View
description:
When using the 'Go Into' action in Navigator View, there are some problems that occur after performing certain actions. Steps to reproduce: 
1. Start with a clean F1 build.
2. Import all plugins from runtime environment to get some projects.
3. Pack a project (e.g. org.eclipse.ant).
4. Perform the following actions: go into, go up, go back, go back - these actions work fine.
5. Close the project.
6. The 'forward' button is still enabled, but clicking it goes to a blank screen.
7. Click the 'forward' button, then click 'back' - this brings back the previous screen.
SR:
The 'Go Into' action in Navigator View has issues after performing the specified actions. Steps to reproduce:
1. Start with a clean F1 build.
2. Import all plugins from runtime environment to get some projects.
3. Pack a project (e.g. org.eclipse.ant).
4. Perform the following actions: go into, go up, go back, go back - these actions work as expected.
5. Close the project.
6. The 'forward' button remains enabled, but clicking it leads to a blank screen.
7. Click the 'forward' button, then click 'back' - this restores the previous screen.
